response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its high worth to you at $15,000, I am offering it to you today at an exclusive price of $12,000. This special offer is designed to ensure you have the opportunity to acquire this valuable asset at a competitive rate while maximizing my earnings. I look forward to your consideration of this proposal.", "product_price": 12000}
